forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High near 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers overnight. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers overnight. Low 54F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 59F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 51F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 12C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High near 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 46F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early then partly cloudy and windy later in the day. High 11C. Winds NW at 30 to 50 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy and windy. High 53F. Winds NW at 20 to 30 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear with gusty winds. Low 6C. Winds NW at 30 to 50 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Gusty winds diminishing after midnight. Low 43F. Winds NW at 20 to 30 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High around 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High around 55F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High 14C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 58F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High 14C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High 58F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High around 15C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High near 60F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
